Package client

This package contains all classes needed for the java

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommunicationClient
    This class will be instantiated by the slave brick to become the client in the two-way communication
    CommunicationController
    This class is used by the communication client to send, receive and process messages
    DPM_Client
    This class is the main method of the slave brick it will start the slave brick as a slave brick
    FlagHandler
    This class will handle all motions regarding the flag handling, including controller of both the lift motor and the claw motors
    LightPoller
    This class is the client-side version of the light poller.
    USPoller
    This class is the client-side version of the US Poller, it will poll the Ultrasonic sensor value, and process it through a mean filter getting both the raw value and the processed mean value as the result
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DPM_Client.LSensor
    The position of the light sensor.
